Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe como empleado de una compañía de manteamiento y reparación de autos, como mecánico.
texts.en:
At Angel Horacio Ocha's home, the exterior needs finishing. He is requesting a loan since he does not currently have the money to make the improvements. He plans to repay the loan with the salary that he receives as a mechanic at a car maintenance and repair company.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: exterior finishes

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.

La  socia es la Sra. Carmela; ella tiene 37 años de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 5 años de edad,  la socia se dedica a la repostería, ella hace en masa elástica caritas pintadas y otros adornos comestibles para la decoración de las tortas infantiles y de todo tipo de compromisos, La socia en la mitad de su tienda desea poner una fotocopiadora, debido a la demanda de la zona. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar dar la inicial de una fotocopiadora y comprar materiales para su negocio. 

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Carmela belongs to the "Qorichuspa" community bank; she lives in the district of Huanchac, in the Cusco province, in the department of Cusco. Carmela is 37, lives with her partner and has 2 children ages 15 and 5. She works as a confectioner. From whipped cream she makes coloured characters and other edible garnishes for decorating children's cakes and all types of orders. She wants to install a photocopier in the middle of her store, given the demand of the area. She is requesting this loan to make the initial purchase of a photocopier and to buy materials for her business. She values and exceedingly appreciates the loan, since it will allow her to expand her business and improve her quality of life. She promises to repay the quotas on time.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase a photocopier and more materials for her business

loans.name: Carol Ivette

texts.es: La Señora Carol Ivette tiene 25. La actividad económica es la venta de productos de belleza. Hace más de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella inicio vendiendo pan, tamales, leche agria por lo que las ganancias de estos fueron invertidos en su negocio ya que los ingresos de la pulpería disminuyeron, es así como decide establecerse con el negocio de la venta de productos de belleza. No es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, pues siempre está pendiente de su negocio. Es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de más productos.
texts.en:
Carol Ivette is 25 years old. She has been earning a living by selling beauty products for more than six years. She started off selling bread, tamales*, and leche agria** and invested the profits from this activity back into her business. As the income from the grocery store decreased, she decided to set up business selling beauty products. This is not the first time she has taken out a loan, as she is always focused on her business. This is why she is requesting a loan to buy more products. * a traditional staple made from a starchy dough and steamed or boiled in a leaf wrapper ** a sour, semi-solid fermented milk dish

Translated from Spanish by Kate Stansfield, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La ciudad de Rayanniyoc se encuentra media hora de la ciudad del Cusco y a una hora de la ciudad del Urubamba. Los pobladores de la ciudad de Rayanniyoc se dedican a la agricultura y a la ganadería. 
 
La señora Luisa, tiene 51 años y tiene  8 hijos de las cuales 3 son independientes y 5 depende de ella todavía. 

Su actividad económica principal de Luisa es vender cereales como por ejemplo tarwi, trigo y muchos productos más. Los días miércoles, viernes y domingos viaja a la ciudad de Urubamba a donde lleva sus productos y se instala en su puesto de venta en el mercado de Urubamba y los días sábados lleva sus productos  a la ciudad del Cusco y se instala en el mercado Molino II. Su actividad económica complementaria es confeccionara chompas, chulos, guantes y chalinas de lana de alpaca. 
 
Luisa pertenece al banco comunal “Villa Rayanniyoc” de la Asociación Arariwa. Ya son varios años que participita en el banco comunal y ella se recuerda que el primer crédito que le dieron fue de 100 dólares. Actualmente, requiere el préstamo para comprar más productos como por ejemplo tarwi, trigo, cebada, etc.
texts.en:
The city of Rayanniyoc is located half an hour from the city of Cusco, and one hour from the city of Urubamba. The residents of the city of Rayanniyoc work in agriculture and raise livestock. Luisa is 51 years old and she has 8 children, 3 of whom are economically independent and 5 still depend on her. Luisa’s business is selling cereals, such as Andean lupine beans, wheat, and many other products. On Wednesdays, Fridays, and Sundays she travels to the city of Urubamba. She takes her products with her and situates herself in her stall in the Urubamba market. On Saturdays she takes her products to the city of Cusco and sells in the Molino II market. Her complementary business activity is knitting sweaters, woolen caps, gloves, and alpaca shawls. Luisa belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Villa Rayanniyoc” communal bank. She has been participating in the communal bank for several years and she remembers that the first they gave her was for $100.00. Now she needs a loan to buy more products such as, for example, Andean lupine beans, wheat, barley, etc.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more cereals, such as wheat, Andean lupine beans, etc.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: El señor Genaro
texts.en:
Genaro AviL. is a father who hopes to give his three school-aged children the best in life. He has built two rooms with some of his savings but hasn't put the roof on them yet. He has plans to build a concrete slab so that the house with be sturdier and longer lasting. He is requesting this loan for that construction project and plans to pay it back through his job as a heavy equipment operator. His wish is that his children have their own room in the house. The person in the photo is Maria Alicia Valadez, Genaro AviL.'s wife. Generao AviL. was not available to be in the picture as he was out of the town for work.

Translated from Spanish by Solson Scherman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Concrete Slab

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar C. E., tiene la edad de 42 años, está casado, y vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ellos tienen 22, 20 y 11 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, chile y tomate, la idea es comprar el abono, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para la siembra de estos cultivos. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento a los cultivos para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Oscar también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Oscar C. E. is 42 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and three children (aged 22, 20, and 11) who are his main priority. He is requesting the loan to help with his farm, specifically for the cultivation of coffee, chili and tomatoes. The purpose of the loan is to buy fertilizer and to hire laborers to sow these crops. He wants to provide his crops with adequate maintenance in order to achieve the best quality and obtain the most income possible at harvest time. This is the first time that he is requesting a loan with FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the easiness of the process. In addition, Don Oscar has worked in agriculture for many years. He hopes the future offers his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability and hopes to be able to continue growing as a person and as a farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Eleanor Francoletti-Putz, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sowing of coffee, chili, and tomato crops

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es:
El señor Genaro G. esta agradecido por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual pudo construir la barda alrededor de la casa. 
Esta nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para empezar la construcción de un cuarto al frente de la vivienda. 
Desea que sus hijos tengan un logar especial en la casa para realizar sus trabajos de la escuela. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo en una fábrica como mecánico. 
La persona que aparece en la foto es la señora Maria Del Socorro Vazquez esposa del señor Genaro G. ya que el se encontraba en su trabajo el día de la visita.
texts.en:
Genaro G. is grateful for your help with the previous loan which enabled him to build the wall around his house. He is requesting another loan to be able to start building a room at the front of the house. He would like his children to have their own space in the house to do their schoolwork. He intends to pay the loan back with the income he earns from his job as a mechanic in a factory. The person shown in the photo is Maria Del Socorro Vazquez, who is Genaro G.’s wife, because he was at work when we visited his home.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Stansfield, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: One-room extension on the ground floor of the house

loans.name: Natalio

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Natalio S. le esta haciendo falta la barda al frente de sus casa, pero por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para empezara la construcción, ya que desea que su familia este segura cuando el no esta en casa.
Es por eso que esta solicitando un préstamo, ya planea pagarlo con el ingreso que obtienen como oficial de validad en la ciudad. 
La persona que aparece en la foto es la señora Nadia Berenice Pérez esposa del señor Natalio ya que el se encontraba en su trabajo el día de la visita.
texts.en:
Natalio S. is lacking a fence in the front of his house, but at this time he doesn't have enough money to start the construction. He wants his family to be safe when he is not at home. That is why he is asking for a loan, and he is planning on paying for it with the income he receives from his job as a traffic officer in the city. The person in the photo is Nadia Berenice Pérez, wife of Natalio, since he was at work the day of the visit.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a fence in front of his house.

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.
	
La  socia es la Sra. Fanny; ella tiene 37 años de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos,  la socia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogos, la socia ofrece sus diversos catálogos de productos de belleza y ella también pide todos los productos que están en oferta para tener en stock, La socia es una mujer muy dedicada a su hogar y este trabajo le permite acomodar sus horarios para estar con sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar del catálogo las ofertas y más adelante venderlos a un poco más. 

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Fanny belongs to the “QORICHUSPA” communal bank. She lives in the Huanchac district in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco. Fanny is 37 years old, married, and has 2 children. She makes a living selling cosmetics from catalogues—she offers different beauty product catalogs, and also orders all of the products that appear in the catalogues so that she has them in stock. Fanny is a woman who is very dedicated to her home, and her work allows her to adjust her hours so that she can be with her children. She is asking for a loan so that she can purchase beauty products from a catalogue and then sell them for a little more than the cost. Fanny greatly appreciates the loan that is being offered, since it will allow her to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She promises to complete her payments according to the terms of the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing products from a catalogue and then selling them for a little more than the cost

loans.name: Octavio Federico

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; El socio vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.
	
El socio es la Sr. Octavio; El socio tiene 48 años de edad el socio es casado tiene 2 hijos, Él trabaja en la telefónica es la empresa que presta servicios telefónicos, él socio también alterna este su trabajo con la artesanía, El socio tiene en su casa un pequeño taller de artesanía, aquí el socio se relaja y le encanta elaborar diferentes objetos. Él socio descubrió su pasión cuando vió en su hijo el amor a este elemento que es la arcilla, el empezó también a descubrir que esto lo relajaba y que era bueno haciendo objetos de decoración, él socio vende su trabajo y está cada día más convencido de que este negocio crecerá.  El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de artesanía.

El socio valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Octavio is a member of the Communal Bank “Qorichuspa”. He lives in the district of Huanchac, province and department of Cusco.

Sr. Octavio is 48 years old, married, and has two children. He works for Telefónica, a company that provides phone services. In addition, he spends parts of his time making handicrafts. Octavio has a small craft shop in his house where he enjoys making different objects as a way of helping him to relax. Octavio discovered his passion after seeing his son work with clay. He found that making decorations was a good way to relax. Upon selling his works, he was convinced that his business would grow. He is requesting a loan to buy raw materials for manufacturing his crafts.

Octavio infinitely values and appreciates the loan that was provided, since this will allow him to grow his business and improve his quality of life. He promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase materials for making handicrafts

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando A. L., tiene la edad de 40 años, está casado, y vive con su esposa y 6 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ellos tienen 18,18,18, 17,13 y 8 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de tomate, la idea es comprar los insumos (abono y el fertilizante) necesarios para el desarrollo y producción del cultivo. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de tomate para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Orlando, también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Orlando A. L. is 40 years old, married, and lives with his wife and six children who are his highest priority. His children range in age between 8 and 18 years of age. This loan will be used to provide assistance for his farm, specifically for growing tomatoes. His plan is to buy supplies (compost and fertilizers) that are needed for the development and production of his crop. Orlando wants to provide his tomato crop proper maintenance so that he can achieve better quality and the highest price possible at harvest time.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the services that have been provided. Don Orlando has worked many years in agriculture. In the future, he hopes to provide his family a better quality of life and greater financial stability. He also hopes to continue growing as a person and a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase compost & fertilizers for his tomato crop

loans.name: Luz De La Esperanza 1 Group

texts.en:
Gloria is the coordinator of her group, Luz de la Esperanza (Light of Hope), and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti). Her group is located in the areas surrounding San Pedro, a poor area where the economy used to thrive on sugar cane but has more recently waned, and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and three children.

Gloria is excited to be taking out her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing more clothes to sell. She will use the profits to convert her wooden home to a concrete structure that will be more sturdy. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: Elisa, de 35 años de edad, convive con su pareja, juntos tienen 4 hijos. Actualmente residen en la localidad de Quimbiri, ubicada en la selva tropical peruana, donde tienen su propia casa a base de madera. Hace más de 10 años se dedica a la actividad agrícola, específicamente a la producción y comercialización de cacao y café. En un comienzo no lo estaba dando frutos como esperaba, pero gracias a la perseverancia, hoy produce una cantidad considerable, y consecuentemente sus ventas han aumentando. Disfruta mucho el trabajo que realiza, además cuenta con un grupo de clientes, quienes fielmente compran su mercadería, debido a la calidad de los productos que ofrece. Generalmente trabaja junto con su pareja, pero en tiempos de cosecha necesita la ayuda de más personal que contrata, para que le puedan facilitar, la extracción de sus productos y su posterior venta en los centro de acopio de su misma localidad, dejando a un precio competitivo. Sus planes a futuro es tener una tienda, con la finalidad de incursionar en otro negocio y tener un ingreso más a su economía, para así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual asegura cumplir fielmente con su cronograma de pagos, además es consciente de que es una oportunidad de pertenecer a un grupo comprometido y seguro, ya que toman decisiones eficaces. Con el crédito que solicita, lo piensa derivar para completar el pago de un terreno, con el propósito de que mas adelante pueda instalar su propia tienda.
texts.en:
Elisa is 35 years old and lives with her husband and their four children. They currently reside in a wooden house that they own in the town of Quimbiri, which is located in the Peruvian tropical jungle. Elisa has been farming for more than ten years, specifically producing and selling cacao and coffee. At first this venture did not produce the results she expected, but thanks to her perseverance, she now produces a considerable quantity and experiences increased sales. She enjoys the work that she does and also has a loyal group of customers who buy her merchandise because of its high quality. Elisa usually works with her husband, but during harvest time they hire additional workers to help facilitate the harvest so that they can later sell their products at the local collection center that offers a competitive price. Her plans for the future include opening a store so that she will have another business for generating extra income to improve her family’s quality of life.

This is her first loan with MFP. Elisa promises to comply faithfully with the payment schedule. She is also aware of this opportunity to be part of a group that is committed and assured in its decision making. The loan she is requesting will be used to complete payment on a piece of land on which she will later build her own store.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Make the final payment on a piece of land where she plans to build her store

loans.name: Ephigénie

texts.fr: Ephigénie S. est une femme de 36 ans,e elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du  Banc Villageois des Femmes Catholiques de Tambacounda depuis son inauguration le 27 juin 2008. Elle a en 2 ans reçu 04 prêts qu'elle a à chaque fois remboursés sans difficulté. Elle est détentrice d'une boutique où elle fait vendre divers produits tels du riz, de l'huile végétale, des boîtes de conserve, du sucre etc. Elle bénéficie des services d'une personne qu'elle rémunère mensuellement. Avec son nouveau prêt elle va renforcer sa boutique en achetant plus de marchandises. Elle contribue financièrement à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille et soutien son mari dans les différentes charges familiales.
texts.en:
Ephigénie S. is a married, 36 year-old woman with four children at home. She has been a member of the Tambacounda Catholic Women Banc Villageois since it opened on June 27, 2008. In two years, she has gotten four loans and each was repaid. She has a shop where she sells products such as rice, vegetable oil, canned goods, sugar, etc. She has an employee who is paid monthly. With her new loan, she wants to buy more goods to improve her store. She contributes financially to improving her family's living conditions and helps her husband with the various family expenses.

Translated from French by Joanne Archambault, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the amount of products in her store

loans.name: Progreso Y Conciliacion 1,2 Group

texts.en: Andrea is the coordinator of her group Progreso y Conciliacion 1,2 ("Progress and Conciliation"), and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) generally. Her group is located in San Pedro D. Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries. The main economic activities are a free trading zone, a cement factory, and others. Running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and two children. Andrea is excited to be taking her sixth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to buy different types of clothes, from pants to skirts and others. She will reinvest the profits in her business. She wants to have a clothing shop or a boutique. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy clothes (pants, shirts, shoes)

loans.name: Deisi Marivel

texts.es:
Deisi Marivel Y. O. tiene 25 años. Tiene 2 niños, Darlen (4) y Britney (8), y vive en unión libre en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Deisi es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Deisi se dedica a la peluquería. Realiza cortas de cabello, manicura, pedicura, tintes y rayitos. Realiza sus compras en la casa de peluquero de mujeres en Guayaquil. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales y productos para su peluquería. Su sueño es  convertirse en una persona útil y que a su peluquería le siga yendo bien para servir a los clientes. Quisiera salir adelante y poder ayudar en lo posible a sus amigos e hijos. 

Le gusta escuchar música y en las noches se dedica a jugar indoor fútbol con un grupo de amigos. Le gusta atender a su familia.
texts.en:
Deisi Marivel Y. O. is 25 years old and has two children, Darlen (age 4) and Britney (age 8). She is in a common law marriage and lives in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar Province.

Deisi is a member of the Santa Rosa Communal Bank, which is located an hour and a half away from the canton of Chillanes. There are 18 members in total, most of whom have their own businesses. This is the first loan they have obtained through Cooperativa San José.

Deisi works as a hairdresser. She provides haircuts, manicures, pedicures, coloring, and highlights. Deisi provides her services at a women’s hair salon in Guayaquil.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials and products for her business. Her dream is to become a more useful person and that her salon will continue to do well in providing good service to her customers. She wants to succeed so that she can help her friends and her children as much as she can.

Deisi enjoys listening to music and playing indoor soccer in the evenings with a group of her friends. She also likes attending to her family.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase materials & products for her salon

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia F. S., tiene la edad de 34 años, está soltera, tiene un hijo de 4 años, y vive con sus padres. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el almácigo para la siembra y el  abono y el fertilizante necesarios para su apropiado desarrollo. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Cuenta con un área de cultivo, la zona es propicia para este cultivo. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Doña Patricia también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora.
texts.en:
Patricia F. S. is 34 years old, single, and lives with her parents and her four year old son. This loan will be used to help with her farm, specifically for growing coffee. Her plan is to buy coffee seedlings to plant and the needed compost and fertilizers for proper development. She wants to provide adequate maintenance to her coffee crops so that she can achieve better quality and obtain the highest price possible at harvest time. Her farmland is located in an area that is ideal for this crop.

This is the first time she has received a loan from FUDECOSUR and she is very happy with the services that have been provided. Doña Patricia has worked many years in agriculture. She hopes to provide her family a better quality of life and greater financial stability. In addition, she hopes to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase coffee seedings, compost, and fertilizers

loans.name: Carmen Amelia

texts.es:
Carmen Amelia L. L. tiene 26 años. Tiene 2 niñas, Catherine (10) y Karen (8), y vive en unión libre en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Carmen es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Carmen se dedica a la compra y venta de productos como naranjas, cacao y yuca. Realiza sus compras en el comisariato. 

Solicita el préstamo para incrementar su negocio de naranjas y cacao. Su sueño es salir adelante con su familia. 
Le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Carmen Amelia L. L. is 26 years old. She has two daughters, ten year old Catherine and eight year old Karen. She is in a common law marriage in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province. Carmen is a member of the Santa Rosa Communal Bank, which is located an hour and a half from the Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in all. Most of them have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the Cooperativa San José. Carmen buys and sells products like oranges, cacao, and yucca. She makes her purchases at the Comisariato (a supermarket chain.) She is requesting the loan to increase her orange and cacao business. Her dream is to get ahead with her family. She likes to listen to music.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her orange and cacao business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Rice and sugar

loans.name: Carmen Diana

texts.es:
Carmen Diana V. Q. tiene 27 años. Es soltera y vive con su hijo, Sebastián de 11 años, en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Carmen es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Carmen es maestra en la escuela “Altos de Bucay”. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar cerdos, que comprara en el comisariato de Bucay. Su sueño es obtener una granja para sus animales.
texts.en:
Carmen Diana V. Q. is 27 years old. She is single, and she lives with her 11 year old son, Sebastián. They live in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province. Carmen is a member of the Santa Rosa Communal Bank, which is an hour and a half from the Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in all. Most of them have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the Cooperativa San José. Carmen is a teacher at the Altos de Bucay School. She is requesting the loan to buy pigs. She will buy the pigs from the Bucay market. Her dream is to have a farm for her animals.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Jose Wilington

texts.es:
Jose Wilington G. P. tiene 19 años. Es soltero y vive con sus padres, en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Jose es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes. Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Jose se dedica a estudiar y trabajar en instalaciones eléctricas y ayudar a sus padres en las casa, y a sus hermanos mas pequeños. Realiza sus compras en el mercado de Bucay. 

Solicita el préstamo para ponerse un pequeño negocio de materiales electricos, para poder ayudar a sus padres.  Su sueño es  terminar sus estudios para poder trabajar con su futura esposa. 
Le gusta jugar fútbol en la liga cantonal de Bucay y jugar un poco voleibol.
texts.en:
José Wilington G. P. is 19 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Chillanes Canton in the province of Bolivar. José is a member of the rural communal bank “Santa Rosa”, which is located an hour and a half from Chillanes Canton. There are 18 members in total and the majority have their own businesses. This is the first loan they are taking out with Cooperativa San José. José studies and works on electrical installations in addition to helping his parents and his younger brothers at home. He shops at the Bucay market. He is requesting this loan to start a small electrical supply business so that he can help his parents. His dream is to finish his studies and be able to work with his fiancée. He enjoys playing soccer in the cantonal league of Bucay and also plays a little volleyball.

Translated from Spanish by Eleanor Francoletti-Putz, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To start a small electrical supply business

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is an individual loan client with Esperanza and her story is representative of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti). She is located in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries; where the main economic activity is a free trading zone, a cement factory, and others; and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her 4 children.

Olga is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business to buy rice, flour, and other foods. Her business is a Colmado, a place where you can find all the ingredients to make your daily food. Normally those colmados are in the same neighborhood, a short walk from any home. She will use the profits to change her house and business from wood to concrete block and give a safer home to her family. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: purchasing rice, beans, sugar, and flour for resale

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ndèye Khoudia

texts.fr: Ndèye Khoudia D. est une femme de 37 ans, elle est mariée et mère 04 enfants   en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANKAGNE 2 depuis son inauguration le 31 mai 2007 et a en 3 ans reçu successivement 6 crédits qu'elle a toujours bien remboursés. Elle est exploitante de bananerais et son actuel prêt lui servira a acheter de l'engrais organique, de la paille pour le paillage, de payer de la main d'œuvre pour les frais de plantation, de payer les frais d'arrosage et donner une caution au groupement du quartier. Avec le bénéfices qui seront réalisés à partir de son activité elle soutien son mari pour la prise en charge quotidienne de la famille.
texts.en:
Ndèye Khoudia D. is a married, 37 year-old woman with four children at home. She has been a member of the SANKAGNE 2 Banc Villageois since it opened on May 31, 2007. In three years, she has received six loans and repaid them in full. She operates a banana plantation. The current loan will be used to buy organic fertilizer and straw for mulch, hire people for planting, pay for watering, and give a security deposit to the neighborhood group. With the profits from her business, she helps her husband with the day-to-day needs of the family.

Translated from French by Joanne Archambault, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operate her banana plantation

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo B. C., tiene la edad de 45 años, está casado, y vive con señora y sus 6 hijos, ellos son su mayor prioridad. Sus hijos tienen 20,18,15,13,10 y 3 años de edad.  El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el abono y el fertilizante, para darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café, y así lograr una mejor calidad y obtener un mayor ingreso cuando sea tiempo de la cosecha, además para pagar la mano de obra. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Guillermo tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Guillermo B. C. is 45 years old and married. He lives with his wife and their six children. They are his greatest priority. His children are 20,18,15,13,10, and 3 years old. He wants the loan to help with his farm. He wants it specifically to help with his coffee crop. The idea is to buy natural and chemical fertilizer to provide adequate maintenance on his coffee crops. That way he will get a better quality and greater income at harvest time. He will also use the loan to pay for the labor. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR, and he is very happy with the terms of the loan. Guillermo has done farming work for several years. In the future he hopes to give his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability. He also wants to be able to keep growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maintenance of his coffee crop

loans.name: Laura Amelia

texts.es:
Laura Amelia M. M. tiene 35 años. Vive con sus 2 hijos, Ruth (15) y Génesis (3), en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Laura es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes. Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Laura se dedica al cuidado y venta de chanchos, pollos y ganado. También se dedica a las tareas del hogar. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Bucay y Santa Rosa. 

Solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de los animales y para comprar medicina para ellos. Su sueño es ampliar una buena granja para los animales. 

Le gusta dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Laura Amelia M. M. is 35 years old. She live with her 2 children, Ruth (15) and Génesis (3) in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province. Laura is a member of the rural communal bank Santa Rosa. It is located an hour and a half from the Chillanes canton. There are a total of 18 members, of which the majority own their own businesses. This is the first loan that they have requested from the San José Cooperative. Laura raises and sells pigs, chicken and cattle. She also takes care of the household duties. She buys and sells in Bucay and Santa Rosa. She is requesting a loan to help with the maintenance of her animals and to buy medicine for them. Her dream is to expand her farm for her animals. She also likes to devote herself to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy medicine for her pigs, chicken and cattle and to help with the maintenance

loans.name: Daniel Napoleón

texts.es:
Daniel Napoleón S. S. tiene 49 años. Vive con sus hijos, Ruth (15) y Génesis (3), en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Daniel es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos S. con la Cooperativa San José.

Daniel se dedica al comercio de chanchos y ganado. Compra sus productos en Bucay y los vende  en su propia casa. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar animales, para incrementar su negocio de chanchos y ganado. Su sueño es tener una granja mucho más grande para poner todos los animales. 

Le gusta practicar deporte en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Daniel Napoleón S. S. is 49 years old and lives with his children, Ruth (15) and Génesis (3), in the Chillanes hamlet, located in the Bolívar province. Daniel is an associate of the “Ventanilla Rural Santa Rosa,” (Santa Rosa Rural Window), located and hour and a half from Chillanes. There are a total of 18 members, most of whom run their own businesses. This will be their first loan through “Cooperativa San José.” Daniel is in the hog and livestock business. He buys his products in Bucay and sells them out of his home. He is asking for this loan in order to buy more animals so that he can grow his business. He hopes to have a much larger farm, someday, where he can keep his animals. Le enjoys playing sports in his spare time.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Livestock

loans.name: Wilson Heriberto

texts.es:
Wilson Heriberto M. S. tiene 44 años. Vive con su esposa y 2 hijas, Tania (16) y Yadira (14), en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Wilson es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes. Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Wilson se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos que compra en Bucay. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar chanchos, para incrementar su negocio. Su sueño seria de tener una pequeña granja para los cerdos. 

Le gusta practicar deportes en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Wilson Heriberto M. S. is 44 years old and lives with his wife and daughters, Tania (16) y Yadira (14), in the Chillanes hamlet, located in the Bolívar province. Wilson is an associate of the “Ventanilla Rural Santa Rosa,” (Santa Rosa Rural Window), located and hour and a half from Chillanes. There are a total of 18 members, most of whom run their own businesses. This will be their first loan through “Cooperativa San José.” Wilson raises and sells hogs which he buys in Bucay. He is asking for this loan in order to buy more hogs so that he can grow his business. He hopes to someday have a small farm for his animals. Le enjoys playing sports in his spare time.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Hogs

loans.name: Santos Anibal

texts.es:
Santos Anibal G. P. tiene 29 años. Es soltero y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Santos es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes. Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Santos trabaja en instalaciones eléctricas residenciales e industriales y vende materiales eléctricos. Realiza las compras en Guayaquil cada 15 días, y hace sus trabaja dentro y afuera de la ciudad. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales eléctricos para trabajar.  Su sueño es tener un almacén de materiales eléctricos completo. 

Le gusta jugar pelota (una forma de fútbol) con sus hermanos y amigos.
texts.en:
Santos Anibal G. P. is 29 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in the canton of Chillanes, in Bolívar province. Santos is a member of the Santa Rosa rural solidarity group, which is located an hour and a half from Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in total, most of whom have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the San José Cooperative. Santos works in residential and industrial electrical installations and sells electrical supplies. He purchases the items in Guayaquil every 15 days, and he does his work within and outside the city. He is requesting the loan to buy electrical supplies for his work. His dream is to have a well-stocked store offering electrical supplies. He enjoys playing pelota (a variation of soccer) with his brothers and friends.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying electrical supplies for his work

loans.name: Oumy

texts.fr: Oumy MANGUANE est une femme de 46 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANKAGNE 2 depuis son inauguration le 31 mai 2007. Elle a 6 fois de suite reçu de crédit et n'a jamais eu de problème de remboursement. Elle est exploitante de bananerais et son nouveau prêt lui permettra d'acheter des intrants agricole, de l'engrais bio, de la paille et de payer d'autres frais liés à son exploitation agricole. Son objectif est de participer financièrement à la prise en charge de la famille par exemple la nourriture et la santé.
texts.en:
Oumy Manguane is a married, 46 year-old woman who is responsible for the care of five children. She has been a member of the SANKAGNE 2 Banc Villageois since it opened on May 31, 2007. She has received six consecutive loans and has never had any problem repaying them. She is a banana farmer. The new loan will enable her to purchase soil additives, organic fertilizer, straw and pay for other expenses related to her farm. Her goal is to financially participate in supporting the family's food and health expenses.

Translated from French by Joanne Archambault, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase soil additives for her farm

loans.name: Dios Bendice Group

texts.en:
Ruth is the coordinator of her group Dios Bendice (God Bless), and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican  clients generally (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti). Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, an area where the economy is dominated by sugarcane and where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long term partner and three children.

Ruth is excited to be taking her first loan from Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her two businesses which are both food markets by purchasing rice, soup, beans, and various other foods by the dozen or in sacks to sell. She will use the profits to save towards continuing to grow her chain of food markets. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: Rice, soup, beans, various other foods by the dozen or in sacks

loans.name: Rocío Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rocío del Carmen V. tiene 31 años. Es casada y vive con su marido y 3 hijos, Morelia (11), Dixon (4) y su bebe de 7 meses, en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Rocío es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Rocío compra y vende pollos. Realiza sus compras en Bucay. 
Solicita el préstamo para su negocio de pollos. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio
texts.en:
Rocío del Carmen V. is 31 years old. She is married and has three children; Morelia 11, Dixon 4, and her 7 month old baby. She lives with her family in Chillanes Canton in the province of Bolivar. Rocio is a member of the rural communal bank “Santa Rosa” which is located an hour and a half from Chillanes Canton. There are 18 members in total and the majority have their own businesses. This is the first loan that she is taking out with Cooperativa San José. Rocio buys and sells chickens. She makes her purchases in Bucay. She is requesting the loan for her chicken business. Her dream is to expand her business.

Translated from Spanish by Eleanor Francoletti-Putz, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Chicken business

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Jose Francisco J. P., tiene 65 años de edad es casado y con su esposa habitan en el barrio de Santa Rosa, ellos tienen 3 hijos mayores de edad, casados e independientes, su esposa se dedica a la venta de frutas, pan, sorbetes, y hielo, el señor trabaja como ebanista desde hace mas de 20 años, es de esta manera que la familia se sostiene económicamente y que con sus propios esfuerzos les abrieron camino a  sus hijos,  que actualmente son ciudadanos de bien que trabajan y sostienen a sus familias respectivamente.

Dentro de los problemas a los que se enfrentaron en su negocio tras todos estos años ha sido la falta de financiamiento y los precios altos de la madera, debido al alza de combustible que le han obstaculizado, compra de un mayor inventario de materias primas, ha sido con su esfuerzo propio que logro la apertura de su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima que le permita llevara a cabo las ordenes de trabajo, esta inversión le favorece en un  futuro contar con los recursos económicos necesarios, para la remodelación de su vivienda, y la tranquilidad necesaria de morar sus días de adultez en un lugar amplio, cómodo y digno de habitar.
texts.en:
José Francisco J. P. is 65 years old. He is married and lives with his wife in the barrio of Santa Rosa. They have three adult children who are married and independent. His wife sells fruit, bread, sorbets, and ice. José has worked as a cabinet-maker for over 20 years. In this way, he supported his family financially and through his hard work, he has paved the way for his children who are now good citizens who work and support their own families. One of the problems he has faced in his business during all these years has been the lack of financing. The high price of wood, due to the rise in fuel costs, has deterred him from purchasing a larger inventory of raw materials. However, he overcame these difficulties and opened his business through his own efforts. For this reason he is requesting a loan for the purchase of raw material which will allow him to fill his work orders. This investment will enable him to count on having the resources he will need in the future for the remodeling of his home, so that he can live his days of adulthood peacefully in a spacious home that is comfortable and habitable.

Translated from Spanish by Eleanor Francoletti-Putz, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase raw materials which will allow him to fill his work orders.

loans.name: Jose Aníbal

texts.es:
Jose Aníbal G. B. tiene 59 años. Es casado y vive con su esposa y 6 hijos, Santos (29), Mayra (25), Wilington (19), Pliño (15), Patricio (11) y Juan (6 meses), en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Jose es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Jose trabaja en la agricultura, cultivando legumbres, y en el negocio de ganadería. Realiza sus compras en los mercados de Bucay y Palla tanga cada domingo o cada 15 días. 

Solicita el préstamo para la agricultura y para su negocio de mercadería. Su sueño es tener una subsistencia y quedarse para sus hijos mas pequeño y su esposa. 

Le gusta jugar indoor fútbol y voleibol.
texts.en:
Jose Anibal G. B. is 59. He's married and lives with his wife and 6 children: Santos (29) Mayra (25) Wilington (19) Pliño (15), Patricio (11) and Juan (6 months) in the Chillanes canton in Bolivar province. Jose is a member of the rural bank Santa Rosa that is located an hour and a half from Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in all and the majority have their own businesses. This is the first loan that they are taking with the San José cooperative. Jose works in farming, growing beans, and he's also in the cattle business. He does his shopping in the open air Bucay and Palla markets every Sunday or every 2 weeks. He is requesting a loan for the farm and for marketing his products. His dream is to have enough income so that he can stay with his youngest children and his wife. He likes to play indoor soccer and volleyball.

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Palacio, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Farming and for marketing his products

loans.name: Aïssatou

texts.fr: Aïssatou S. est mariée, elle est âgée de 32 ans et mère de 03 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANKAGNE 2 depuis son inauguration le 31 mai 2007. Elle a en 3 ans d'existence dans le Banc Villageois reçu cumulativement 06 prêts qu'elle a toujours bien gérés. Elle est exploitante agricole et son nouveau crédit lui servira à acheter des intrants agricoles, de l'engrais bio, de  la paille et payer d'autres frais liés à l'exploitation de sa bananerais.
texts.en:
Aïssatou S. is a 32 year-old, married woman who is responsible for three children. She has been a member of the SANKAGNE 2 Banc Villageois since it opened on May 31, 2007. In the three years with the Banc Villageois, she has received 6 loans and has repaid them all. She is a farmer. The new loan will enable her to purchase soil additives, organic fertilizer, straw and pay for other expenses related to her banana farm.

Translated from French by Joanne Archambault, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Strengthen her farming business

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo A. M., tiene la edad de 47 años, está soltero, y vive solo.El crédito lo quiere para la compra de algunos terneros y su alimentación. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al ganado para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área idónea para el mantenimiento y cría del ganado. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Gerardo tiene varios años dedicado al ganado. El espera en un futuro tener una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Gerardo A. M. is 47 years old, single and lives alone. He is seeking the loan to buy some calves and their feed. He wants to raise them as well as possible so that he can get the best price for them when he sells them. He also wants to increase the number of his animals and maintain them in better conditions. He has an ideal place to raise cattle. This is the first time that he is taking out a loan with FUDECOSUR, and he is very happy with the services they provide. Mr. A. has several years experience raising cattle. He hopes to have a better quality of life in the future and more economic stability, as well as to be able to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Jacqueline Demeranville, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle (calves)

loans.name: Nilda Zoraida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.
	
La  socia es la Sra. Nilda; ella tiene 53 años de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando la superior,  ella vive en el barrio de Ttio. La socia es profesora de manualidades, ahora ella se dedica a la costurería, ella elabora a máquina y a mano diferentes trabajos de bordados y tejidos, ella hace forros de cojines, camas, sillones y también realiza disfraces costumbristas de nuestra región y otros para amenizar fiestas infantiles,  los cuales alquila; La socia tiene un pequeño taller en el cual enseñan y  está ubicado en el barrio de magisterio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para su costura, como son hilos, telas, adornos y más.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “QORICHUSPA”. She lives in the Huanchac district in Cusco province in the department of Cusco. The member, Nilda, is 53 years old, married, and has two children in high-school. She lives in the Ttio neighborhood. She is a handicrafts teacher, and is now working as a seamstress. With a sewing machine, and by hand, she embroiders, knits, and makes covers for cushions, beds and chairs. She also makes traditional costumes from her and other regions, which she rents out to liven up children’s parties. She has a small workshop where she teaches that is located in the teaching neighborhood. She is soliciting the loan to buy materials for her sewing, such as thread, fabric, decorations etc. She values and is infinitely grateful for the loan given, since it allows her to grow with her business and improve her quality of life. Moreover, she commits to making all of her loan payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Jacqueline Demeranville, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sewing materials

loans.name: Pedro Miguel

texts.es:
Pedro Miguel H. G. tiene 20 años. Es soltero y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Pedro es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Pedro se dedica a la crianza de pollos de lunes a viernes, y al deporte los fines de semana. Realiza sus compras en el mercado y comisariato. 

Solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos para criarlos. Su sueño es estudiar para ser profesor. Enfrenta desafíos con la salud y vivienda. 

Le gusta escuchar música y hacer deporte los fines de semana.
texts.en:
Pedro Miguel H. G. is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolívar. Pedro is a member of the Santa Rosa rural solidarity group that is located an hour and a half from the canton of Chillanes. There are 18 members in total, the majority of which have their own businesses. This is the first loan that they are taking out with the San José cooperative. Pedro works raising chickens from Monday to Friday, and plays sports on the weekend. He makes his purchases in the market. He is seeking the loan to buy chickens to raise. His dream is to study to be a teacher. He is facing challenges with his health and accommodation. He likes to listen to music and play sports on the weekend.

Translated from Spanish by Jacqueline Demeranville, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy chickens to raise

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: Gregoria, de 52 años, es viuda y tiene tres hijos; Juan, Bertha y Wilder de 16, 13 y 11 años respectivamente. Juntos residen en la hermosa selva cusqueña, ubicada en la localidad de Quimbiri, donde tienen su propia casa. Todo inició cuando desde muy joven empezó a trabajar para un agricultor, en ese entonces cultivaba y cosechaba cacao, ella sentía que no tenia posibilidades de crecimiento y que solo con el sueldo que recibía procuraba ahorrarlo con la finalidad de tener su propio negocio. Actualmente cultiva y comercializa frutas, específicamente piña, y gracias a las enseñanzas de cultivo que le dieron sus padres, puede ahora obtener productos de alta calidad, por las cuales sus compradores más potenciales se sienten satisfechos, de esta manera este negocio le está dando buenos resultados económicos. Por lo general trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos, en temporada de cosecha contrata personal para que le faciliten la extracción y traslado de sus productos hacia los centros de acopio de su comunidad, con la finalidad de poder venderlo a un precio justo. Sus planes a futuro es abrir su propia tienda con la finalidad de poder tener más ingresos. Este es su sexto crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con sus respectivos pagos, además agradece a su grupo comunal por la solidaridad que se dan entre cada uno de los compañeros. Con el crédito que solicita, lo piensa invertir para darle un adecuado cuidado a sus plantaciones, comprando insumos y abono, para prevenir las plagas u otras afecciones que atacan a las piñas.
texts.en:
Gregoria, age 52, is a widow. She has three children, Juan, Bertha, and Wilder, ages 16, 13, and 11, respectively. They live together in the beautiful jungle of Cusco province, located in the town of Quimbiri, where they have their own house.

When she was very young, she began working for a farmer who was then growing and harvesting cacao. She felt that she didn’t have any chance of progressing, and, only with the salary that she was receiving, she took pains to save money with the goal of having her own business.

Currently, she grows and sells fruit, specifically pineapples. Thanks to the education in farming given to her by her parents she now obtains high quality products with which potential purchasers are satisfied. Because of this the business is giving her good economic results.

In general, she works by herself, but occasionally she receives help from her children, and during the harvest season she hires people to assist her in picking and transferring her products to collection centers in her community with the goal of being able to sell them for a fair price. Her plan for the future is to open her own shop in order to be able to have greater income

This is her sixth loan with MFP, and she has promised to continue making all her payments. She is thankful to her communal group for the solidarity shown to each one of her colleagues. She plans to invest the loan she is applying for in giving adequate care to her crops by purchasing supplies and fertilizer in order to prevent disease and other infections that attack pineapples.

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and supplies in order to care for her pineapple crop.

loans.name: Saira Patricia

texts.es:
Saira Patricia C. C. tiene 30 años. Es casada y vive con su esposo y 4 hijos, Johanna (10), Martha (9), Angélica (7) y Héctor (18 meses), en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Saira es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Saira se dedica al negocio de naranjas y cacao. Realiza sus compras en Bucay. 
Solicita el préstamo para naranjas y cacao. Su sueño es engrandecer su negocio que tenga para un futuro mejor. 

Le gusta trabajar y jugar con su familia.
texts.en:
Saira Patricia is 30 years old. She is married, and lives with her husband and 4 children, Johanna (10), Martha (9), Angélica (7), and Héctor (18 months), in Chillanes canton, Bolívar province. Saira is a member of the Santa Rosa rural bank, located an hour and a half from Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in all, the majority of whom have their own businesses. This is the 1st loan they have requested from San José Cooperative. Saira sell oranges and cacao. She buys her merchandise in Bucay and is soliciting the loan to buy more oranges and cacao. Her dream is to enlarge her current business in order to have a better future. She likes to work and play with her family.

Translated from Spanish by Harold Sims, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: BUYING ORANGES AND CACAO FOR HER BUSINESS

loans.name: Mbayang

texts.fr: Mbayang N. est une femme de 30 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants en charge. elle est membre du banc Villageois de SANKAGNE 2 depuis le 31 mai 2007 et y a bénéficié de 05 crédit qu'elle a gérés et remboursés régulièrement. Elle développe une activité de petit commerce et son prêt lui permettra de faire un renforcement d'activité en achetant plus de marchandises telles des tissus, des voiles et des chaussures. Les bénéfices générés lui permettent de participer à la prise en charge financière de la famille par exemple la nourriture, la santé et l'habillement des enfants.
texts.en:
Mbayang N. is a married, 30 year-old woman who is responsible for four children. She has been a member of the SANKAGNE 2 Banc Villageois since May 31, 2007. She has received five loans and has repaid them properly.She has a small business. Her loan will allow her to buy more items like fabrics, veils and shoes to improve her business. The revenues will allow her to financially contribute to meeting family expenses such as food, health and clothing for the children.

Translated from French by Joanne Archambault, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Develop and promote her revenue-generating business

loans.name: Wilner Oswaldo

texts.es:
Wilner Oswaldo D. T. tiene 31 años. Tiene 2 niños, Bryan (6) y Jairon (3), y vive en unión libre en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Wilner es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Wilner se dedica a la agricultura. Realiza sus compras y ventas en el mercado la Merced en Chillanes.
Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la agricultura. Su sueño es hacer una casa par sus hijos. 

Le gusta jugar fútbol y correr en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Wilner Oswaldo D. T. is 31 years old. He has two sons, six year old Bryan and three year old Jairon. He is in a common law marriage, and he lives in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province. Wilner is a member of the Santa Rosa Communal Bank, which is one and a half hours from the Cillanes canton. There are 18 members in all. Most of them have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the Cooperativa San José. Wilner works in agriculture. He makes his purchases and sales in the Merced market in Chillanes. He is requesting the loan to invest in agriculture. His dream is to build a house for his children. In his free time he likes to play soccer and run.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in agriculture

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.
	
La  socia es la Sra. Francisca; ella tiene 43 años de edad;  La socia es conviviente y tiene un pequeño local en el barrio de Arcopata, ella vende ceviche, la socia desea implementar su local ella quiere mejorarlo y poner más decoración, mesas, cuadros, vajillas. Su deseo a futuro inmediato es hacer un restaurante más grande y bonito, con buena atención y rica comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar utensilios, insumos, adornos, mesas, sillas para el local. 

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Qorichuspa Communal Bank. The member lives in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department. The member is Francisca. She is 43 years old, and she is in a common law marriage. She has a small place where she sells “ceviche” (citrus marinated seafood) in the Arcopata neighborhood. The member wants to set up her place and improve it. She wants to have more decorations, tables, pictures, and dishes. Her wish for the immediate future is to make a larger restaurant that is pretty, has good service, and has delicious food. The member is asking for the loan to buy utensils, supplies, decorations, tables, and chairs for her place. The member is infinitely grateful for and values the loan. It allows her to grow with her business and improve her quality of live. She commits to making her payments on time.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Set up and improve her place of business

loans.name: Jose Concepción

texts.es:
La señor J. C. Velasquez Sánchez, tiene la edad de 52 años y  vive en el barrio Medardo Andino, es casado y su esposa se dedica a los trabajos del hogar, tienen dos hijos que se dedican a los estudios, el señor J. C. es agricultor y tienen más de 20 años de experiencia en esta actividad.

La agricultura ha sido el sustento de toda su familia, años atrás con la reforma agraria y su esfuerzo propio fue que logro comprar un terreno y sembrar aguacates, dentro de sus máximas necesidades para las cosechas es la inversión de materiales agrícolas que aporten un mejor mantenimiento para la producción de las siembras, razón por la cual solicitan de un préstamo para la compra de fungicidas, repelentes e insecticidas que le permitan llevar a sus terrenos a un nivel optimo, esta inversión le traerá a futuro beneficios económicos que le permitirán mejores condiciones sociales para su familia.
texts.en:
J. C. Velasquez Sánchez, age 52, lives in the Medardo Andino neighborhood. He is married, and his wife does the household chores. They have two children who go to school. José C. is a farmer, and he has 20 years of experience in this activity. Farming has supported his entire family. Years ago, with the agrarian reform and his own effort, he bought some land and planted avocados. One of the biggest necessities for the crops is buying agricultural materials that support better maintenance for crop production. That is why he is requesting a loan to buy fungicides, repellents, and insecticides. These will allow him to bring his crops to an optimal level. This investment will bring economic benefits in the future. This will allow his family to have better living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fungicides, repellents, and insecticides that will allow him to bring his crops to an optimal level

loans.name: Fabián Vicente

texts.es:
Fabián Vicente Q. V. tiene 25 años. Es soltero y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Fabián es un socio de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Fabián se dedica a la agricultura. Vende sus productos en Chillanes y hace las compras en Bucay. 

Solicita el préstamo para invertir en un negocio para vender sus productos agrícolas. Su sueño es  tener un gran negocio para su futuro. 

Le gusta jugar fútbol en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Fabián Vicente Q. V. is 25 years old. He is single, and he lives with his parents in the Chillanes canton in the Bolívar province. Fabián is a member of the Santa Rosa Communal Bank, which is located one and a half hours from the Chillanes canton. There are 18 members in all. Most of them have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the Cooperativa San José. Fabián is a farmer. He sells his products in Chillanes and makes his purchases in Bucay. He is requesting a loan to invest in his business in order to sell his agricultural products. His dream is to have a great business in the future. He likes to play soccer in his free time.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in his business in order to sell his agricultural products

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander N. C., tiene la edad de 33 años, está casado, y tiene 1 hijo que es su mayor prioridad. El tiene 7 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de materiales para realizar una cerca eléctrica. Con esta cerca lo que busca es proteger a los animales, de tenerlos más seguros en el potrero.   También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área idónea para el mantenimiento y cría del ganado. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Alexander  tiene varios años dedicada al ganado. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Alexander N. C. is 33 years old and married. He has a seven year old child who is his greatest priority. He wants the loan to buy materials to build an electrical fence. The fence is to protect the animals and have them be more secure in the pasture. He also wishes to increase the number of animals he has and be able to maintain them in better conditions. He has an ideal area in which to maintain and raise the livestock. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR, and he is very happy with the terms of the loan. Alexander has worked with livestock for several years. In the future he hopes to give his family a better quality of life and greater economic security. He also hopes to be able to keep growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy materials to build an electrical fence

loans.name: Mayra Edith

texts.es:
Mayra Edith G. P. tiene 23 años. Es soltera y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Magra es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Mayra trabaja en pronaza. Se dedica a la venta de frutas como naranjas y mandarinas. Hace las compras y ventas en Bucay. 
Solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de cultivos de cacao. 

Le gusta escuchar música y jugar fútbol.
texts.en:
Mayra Edith Granzio P. is 23 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolivar. Mayra is a member of the Santa Rosa communal bank, which is located 1.5 hours from the cantón of Chillanes. There are a total of 18 members and the majority of them have their own businesses. This is their first loan with the Cooperativa San José. Mayra works at Pronaza. She sells fruit such as oranges and tangerines. She does her buying and selling in Bucay. She is requesting the loan for use in taking care of cacao plants. She likes to listen to music and watch soccer.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To care for cacao crops

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando B. C., tiene la edad de 46 años, es casado, y tiene 3 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ellos tienen 15,13 y 8 años de edad.  El crédito lo quiere para la compra de cerdos para engorde. La idea es darle el adecuado mantenimiento a los cerdos para poder desarrollar animales de mejor calidad, y obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. El desea aprovechar  la instalación que posee para poder desarrollar adecuadamente la porcicultura. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Fernando  tiene varios años en este negocio de cerdos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Fernando B. C. is 46 years old, is married, and has 3 children, who are his greatest priority. They are 15, 13, and 18 years old. He needs the loan to buy pigs for fattening. The idea is to give them good care so that they can grow to be animals of the best quality, so that he can earn the best possible income when he sells them. He wants to use the facilities he owns to carry out high-quality swine production. This is the first time he has taken a loan with FUDECOSUR and he is very content with the terms they have provided him. Fernando has been working in this business for several years. He hopes that in the future he will be able to provide his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability. He also wants to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pigs for fattening

loans.name: Norma Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORICHUSPA”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco, del departamento de Cusco.
	
La  socia es la Sra. Norma; ella tiene 51 años de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos estudiantes en la etapa superior; La socia es docente de inicial (jardín de niños) de profesión, La socia goza de un carácter muy agradable, ella trabaja en un jardín de niños y disfruta mucho de ellos, es una mujer muy querendona y con mucho amor a los niños, por lo que sigue enseñando en este su propio jardín, La socia cada cierto tiempo renueva y está implementando su jardín con materiales de estudio y otros. Ella también realiza en su propia casa materiales de educación bastantes didácticos para la venta a otros centros de formación inicial, ella realiza diversos tipos de trabajos entre los que está los sellos con dibujos dinámicos y otros materiales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar en la ciudad de Lima materiales para realizar útiles educativos dinámicos para formación inicial.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Qorichuspa” communal bank. She lives in the Huanchac district, in the the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco. The member is Norma. She is 51 years old. She is married and has 2 children who are in high school. She is a kindergarten teacher by profession. She has a very agreeable character. She works in a kindergarten and really enjoys it. She is a very affectionate person and has a lot of love for the children, which is why she teaches in her own kindergarten. Every so often she makes some changes and uses new study materials and other items in her kindergarten. She also creates her own educational materials, which are very instructive, for sale to other kindergartens. She makes a variety of materials, among which are stamps with dynamic drawings and other materials. Norma is requesting the loan to buy materials in Lima for making educational materials for kindergarten. She values and is infinitely grateful for the loan she has been granted because it will allow her to grow with her business and improve her quality of life. She promises to make her payments within the stipulated timeframe.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy materials for making education materials for sale

loans.name: Aïssatou

texts.fr: Aïssatou F. est une femme de 34 ans, elle mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANKAGNE 2 depuis l'inauguration le 31 mai 2007 et en 3 ans elle a bénéficié de 06 crédits qu'elle a bien gérés et remboursés sans problème. Elle est exploitante de bananerais et son crédit lui permettra de d'acheter des intrants agricoles, des engrais bio et de payer d'autres charge d'exploitation. Elle a comme objectif de soutenir financièrement son mari pour la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
Aissatou F. is a 34-years old woman, married, and the mother of three children. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of Sankagne 2 since its inception on May 31, 2007; in the past three years she had obtained six loans, all of which she managed well and repaid without issues. She is a banana farmer, and her credit will allow her to buy agricultural inputs such as bio fertilizers and to pay other related costs. Her goal is to support her husband financially in taking care of the family needs.

Translated from French by Ekaterina Sukhanova, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Strengthen her agricultural enterprise

loans.name: Maria Elba

texts.es:
Maria Elba P. C. tiene 47 años.  Es casada y vive con su esposo e hijos en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.

Maria es una socia de la ventanilla rural Santa Rosa, que está ubicada a una hora y media del cantón Chillanes.  Son 18 socios en total, que en la mayoridad tienen sus propios negocios. Esto es el primer  préstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San José.

Maria se dedica a ama de casa. 
Solicita el préstamo para comprar chanchos. Su sueño es que le vaya bien a su negocio.  

En su tiempo libre, le gusta disfrutar con su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Elba P. C. is 47 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children in the canton of Chillanes in Bolivar province. Maria belongs to the communal bank Santa Rosa, which is located an hour and a half from Chillanes. There are 18 members in all, and the majority of them have their own businesses.
